---@class AnimatorSystem:SimpleClassUtil
local AnimatorSystem = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function AnimatorSystem:initialize(go_model)

    self._go_model = go_model

    self._animator = go_model.transform:GetComponent("Animator")

    self._status = Enum_Battle.AniState

    self._speed = 1
end

function AnimatorSystem:crossFade(state,notReset,normalizedTransitionDuration)
    if self._animator then
        notReset = notReset or false
        normalizedTransitionDuration = normalizedTransitionDuration or 0.2
        if notReset and state == self._status then
            return
        end
        if state == self._status then
            self._status = state
            self._animator:Play(state,0,0)
        else
            self._status = state
            self._animator:CrossFade(state,normalizedTransitionDuration )
        end

    end
end

function AnimatorSystem:setSpeed(speed)
    if speed then
        self._speed = speed
        self._animator.Speed = speed
    end
end

function AnimatorSystem:getSpeed()
    return self._speed
end

return AnimatorSystem
